alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:55AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Deuel, Hamlin and southeastern Codington Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 555 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dempster, or near Lake Poinsett, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dempster around 600 AM CDT. Estelline, Claremont Colony and Poinsett Colony around 605 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clear Lake, Brandt, Gary, Lake Cochrane Rec Area and Moritz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
